definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The chameleon's skin replicates the pattern of its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 變色龍的皮膚可隨環境的模式而改變顏色。

sentences.english: She is very beautiful, I bet this is the most beautiful in the world chameleon.
sentences.chinese: 她真漂亮，我敢打賭，這是全世界最漂亮的變色龍。

sentences.english: The eyes of anole can be versatile.
sentences.chinese: 變色龍的眼睛可以轉動。

sentences.english: For chameleons this is a defense strategy, is it the same for us?
sentences.chinese: 對於變色龍來說，這叫做保護色，對我們也是這樣嗎？

sentences.english: Management who is chameleon style will lead followers through the adapter of organization culture.
sentences.chinese: 變色龍型以適配組織文化的方法來領導下屬。

sentences.english: The chameleon's skin replicates the pattern of its surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 變色龍的皮膚可隨環境改變顏色。

sentences.english: Mine-laying chameleon droids were dispatched to demolish the caves with explosives.
sentences.chinese: 負責佈雷的變色龍機器人被派去用炸藥摧毀洞穴。

sentences.english: NEDs would benefit from being more chameleon-like.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們更像變色龍一些，他們將會從中受益。

sentences.english: Plenty! From its tongue to its tail the chameleon offers a storehouse of specialities.
sentences.chinese: 從舌頭到尾巴，變色龍有一大堆特點。

sentences.english: But chameleons do have great eyesight invaluable to us on our quest for baby lemurs.
sentences.chinese: 但變色龍的視力很好，對於尋找狐猴寶寶蹤跡很有用。

sentences.english: He believes that chameleon-like adaptive fabrics will be ready for duty within ten years.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，變色龍般的自適應面料在十年內就能實用。

sentences.english: Chameleon cowards bask in whatever shade suits them.
sentences.chinese: 怯懦的變色龍則在能容它之處尋找廕庇。

sentences.english: What color is a chameleon placed on the mirror?
sentences.chinese: 放在鏡子上的變色龍是什麼顏色的？

sentences.english: DNA evidence has pinned iguanas and chameleons as the closest relatives to snakes.
sentences.chinese: DNA證據表明鬣蜥和變色龍與蛇的關係最密切。

definition: to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
(of fruit etc) fresh/(of a person etc) full of life/healthy-looking/(of eyes) moist and bright/lustrous
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
